thread.title: Watch Anderson .Paak Peform with A Tribe Called Quest at the 2017 Grammys
thread.title_full: Watch Anderson .Paak Peform with A Tribe Called Quest at the 2017 Grammys

author: Noisey Staff
title: Watch Anderson .Paak Peform with A Tribe Called Quest at the 2017 Grammys
text:
Watch Anderson .Paak Peform with A Tribe Called Quest at the 2017 Grammys The performance featured a Phife Dawg tribute, Busta Rhymes, and Consequence 
A Tribe Called Quest took the stage at the 2017 Grammys to perform songs from their We Got It From Here...Thank You 4 Your Service album. The group started with classic track "Award Tour," honoring the late Phife Dawg. Anderson .Paak, who was on the drums, joined them for song "Moving Backwards." Busta Rhymes and Consequence came out to join Tribe for lead single "We The People..." As the song was performed, people representing the disenfranchised groups mentioned in its chorus joined the performers on stage. Watch portions of the performance below.
